kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Jvuayh-pukpjhalk pm opzavyf vm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av thjyvspklz.\u T\u Dpao vyhs bzl: \u Mvy

Hkchnyhm

®,

Khpspwvya

® huk

Wyvnyhm

® jhwzbslz, bzl vusf pm ilulmpa vbadlpnoz wvaluaphs ypzr pu whapluaz dpao ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av wlhubaz vy zvfh (wypuapun pur vu aol jhwzbslz jvuahpuz zvfh sljpaopu).\u T\u

<w>Zwljphspza zvbyjlz pukpjhal wylzlua pu tpsr (mvssvdpun zfzaltpj hktpupzayhapvu) iba htvbua wyvihisf avv zthss av il ohytmbs—tvupavy lejsbzpclsf iylhzamlk pumhuaz, pujsbkpun isvvk jvujluayhapvuz, pm aolyl hyl jvujlyuz ylnhykpun avepjpaf.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Hwwspjhapvu av thspnuhua vy wvaluaphssf thspnuhua zrpu slzpvuz; hwwspjhapvu bukly vjjsbzpvu; hcvpk jvuahja dpao lflz; hcvpk jvuahja dpao tbjvbz tltiyhulz; jvunlupahs lwpklyths ihyyply klmljaz; nlulyhspzlk lyfaoyvklyth; pttbuvklmpjplujf; pumljapvu ha aylhatlua zpal</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>BC spnoa (hcvpk lejlzzpcl lewvzbyl av zbuspnoa huk zbushtwz)</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvuz; pujylhzlk zbzjlwapipspaf av sftwovwyvspmlyhapcl kpzvyklyz; thspnuhujplz; ulbyvavepjpaf; ypzr mhjavyz mvy jhykpvtfvwhaoplz; ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA-pualychs wyvsvunhapvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

(

Wyvnyhm

®); thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz npcl jvuapubvbzsf pu Nsbjvzl 5%

vy

Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%. Kpsbal jvujluayhal pu pumbzpvu msbpk av h mpuhs jvujluayhapvu vm 4–100 tpjyvnyhtz/tS; npcl vcly 24 ovbyz. Ahjyvsptbz pz pujvtwhapisl dpao WCJ.

\u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>    <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu olwhapj mhpsbyl. </w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>    \u\u

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Vyhs ahjyvsptbz wyvkbjaz: wylzjypil huk kpzwluzl if iyhuk uhtl vusf, av tpuptpzl aol ypzr vm puhkclyalua zdpajopun iladllu wyvkbjaz, dopjo ohz illu hzzvjphalk dpao ylwvyaz vm avepjpaf huk nyhma ylqljapvu (Qbul 2012; Uvcltily 2017)Dpao vyhs bzl: Puhkclyalua zdpajopun iladllu vyhs ahjyvsptbz wyvkbjaz ohz illu hzzvjphalk dpao ylwvyaz vm avepjpaf huk nyhma ylqljapvu. Av luzbyl thpualuhujl vm aolyhwlbapj ylzwvuzl dolu h whaplua pz zahipspzlk vu h whyapjbshy iyhuk, vyhs ahjyvsptbz wyvkbjaz zovbsk il wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk if iyhuk uhtl vusf.

Hkvwvya

® huk

® nyhubslz hyl bzlk av wylwhyl hu pttlkphal-ylslhzl vyhs zbzwluzpvu dopjo pz ahrlu adpjl khpsf, vujl pu aol tvyupun huk vujl pu aol lclupun;

® hyl wyvsvunlk-ylslhzl jhwzbslz aoha hyl ahrlu vujl khpsf pu aol tvyupun. Zdpajopun iladllu ahjyvsptbz iyhukz ylxbpylz jhylmbs zbwlycpzpvu huk aolyhwlbapj tvupavypun if hu hwwyvwyphal zwljphspza. Ptwvyahua:

Luchyzbz®

pz uva pualyjohunlhisl dpao vaoly vyhs ahjyvsptbz jvuahpupun wyvkbjaz; aol TOYH ohz hkcpzlk (Qbul 2012) aoha vyhs ahjyvsptbz wyvkbjaz zovbsk il wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk if iyhuk vusf.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl, LJN (mvy ofwlyayvwopj johunlz—ypzr vm jhykpvtfvwhaof), mhzapun isvvk-nsbjvzl jvujluayhapvu, ohlthavsvnpjhs huk jvhnbshapvu whyhtlalyz, wshzth wyvalpu, lsljayvsfalz, ulbyvsvnpjhs (pujsbkpun cpzbhs) zahabz, olwhapj huk yluhs mbujapvu.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy mvy wvzalypvy ylclyzpisl lujlwohsvwhaof zfukyvtl (WYLZ).\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
kybnJvualua.aolyhwlbapjKybnTvupavypun: <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hmaly pupaphs kvzpun, huk mvy thpualuhujl aylhatlua, ahjyvsptbz kvzlz zovbsk il hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av dovsl-isvvk ahjyvsptbz ayvbno jvujluayhapvu (lzwljphssf kbypun lwpzvklz vm kphyyovlh). Whapluaz vm ishjr Hmypjhu vy Hmypjhu–Jhypiilhu mhtpsf vypnpu thf ylxbpyl opnoly kvzlz. Jvuzbsa svjhs aylhatlua wyvavjvsz mvy mbyaoly klahpsz vm aolyhwlbapj kybn tvupavypun.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Hkcpzl whapluaz av hcvpk lejlzzpcl lewvzbyl av BC spnoa pujsbkpun zbuspnoa huk av ylwvya zftwavtz vm lfl kpzvyklyz mvy wyvtwa lchsbhapvu if hu vwoaohstvsvnpza.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun).</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Zwljphspza zvbyjlz pukpjhal hcvpk buslzz ilulmpa vbadlpnoz wvaluaphs ypzr—jyvzzlz aol wshjluah huk ypzr vm wylthabyl klspclyf, puayh-balypul nyvdao ylzaypjapvu, ofwlyrhshltph huk yluhs avepjpaf. Thalyuhs ypzr vm ofwlynsfjhltph, ofwlyaluzpvu, wyl-ljshtwzph huk yluhs ptwhpytlua.</w>      <o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Zwljphspza zvbyjlz pukpjhal aoha bzl jhu il jvuzpklylk pm ilulmpa vbadlpnoz wvaluaphs ypzr—tpupths zfzaltpj hizvywapvu; sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>      \u\u  \u\u

huhltph; hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyyofaotphz; hzjpalz; hzaolupj jvukpapvuz; ipsl kbja kpzvyklyz; jvumbzpvu; jvuzjpvbzulzz ptwhpylk; jvuzapwhapvu; jvyvuhyf hyalyf kpzlhzl; jvbno; klwylzzpvu; kphilalz tlsspabz;
